text:
Barbara Ann "Bobbie" Battista (July 23, 1952 – March 3, 2020) was an American journalist and a known newscaster on CNN. During her 20-year career with the cable news company, Battista wrote many programs on CNN, CNN Headline News, and CNN International.
She died of cervical cancer on March 3, 2020 in Davenport, Iowa, at the age of 67.
